snippet: Since the acquisition of diminutive and lesser-known creatures like the Patagonian cavy and the cassowary, zoo attendance has risen.
abstract: Attendance at the Staten Island Zoo has risen since acquisition of diminutive and lesser known creatures like Patagonian cavy and fossa cats; zoo's curator Dr Marc T Valitutto gets financial support through crowdfunding website Indiegogo, which received $9,000 in donations in 2013 to purchase cassowary bird.
lead_paragraph: Since the acquisition of diminutive and lesser-known creatures like the Patagonian cavy and the cassowary, zoo attendance has risen.

headline.main: Staten Island Zoo Capitalizes on the Small and Obscure
headline.print_headline: A Little Zoo Capitalizes on the Small and Obscure
